--- layout: example.html title: WMS GetFeatureInfo (Tile Layer) shortdesc: Issuing GetFeatureInfo requests with a WMS tiled source docs: > This example shows how to trigger WMS GetFeatureInfo requests on click for a WMS tile layer. Additionally map.forEachLayerAtPixel is used to change the mouse pointer when hovering a non-transparent pixel on the map. tags: "getfeatureinfo, forEachLayerAtPixel" ---
